channel.title: Major Help - Help A Pal Out!
channel.description:
I need to make a poem for english, but I have never writen a poem in my life! :|
[i][b]Poetry Schemes:[/b][/i] [i]Limerick: "aabba" 2,4,6,8,1 (That one poem that adds up to 21)[/i]
[u][b]Possible Poems:[/b][/u] [i]Nature Television Sleep Music Video Games Motorcycles[/i]

item.title: Major Help - Help A Pal Out!
item.dc:creator: @TeraByte TeraByte
item.description:
@TeraByte wrote:

Thanks, although I hope you did not copy it, because

  1. I made that up on the spot, and my English teacher would fail me if I handed in a poem like that to her, and
  2. If your teacher knows how to use Google, and she finds out you plagiarized, you’re screwed.

Read full topic
item.source: Major Help - Help A Pal Out!

item.title: Major Help - Help A Pal Out!
item.dc:creator: @Heroic Heroic
item.description:
@Heroic wrote:

[quote=“TeraByte, post:8, topic:82881”]Nature flew, nature soared,
Life that nature once had stored.
Up above, down below,
Humans took what humans know.
That once blue sky, that once green grass,
Grayed and browned in one swift pass.
Memories forgotten, beauty once seen,
Now remains silent, not peaceful, nor clean.

I made that up on the spot, do not flame me because I suck at English.[/quote]
You are master! Thanks, ++rep for you buddy! This will help me pass
Credits to you

Read full topic
item.source: Major Help - Help A Pal Out!

item.title: Major Help - Help A Pal Out!
item.dc:creator: @Heroic Heroic
item.description:
@Heroic wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:6, topic:82881”][quote author=Heroic link=topic=121776.msg1192792#msg1192792 date=1177190900]
I need to make a poem for english, but I have never writen a poem in my life!

Poetry Schemes:
Limerick: “aabba”
2,4,6,8,1 (That one poem that adds up to 21)

Possible Poems:
Nature
Television
Sleep
Music
Video Games
Motorcycles
[/quote]

I’m sure the teacher/proff wouldn’t give you work you haven’t learnt about before. You have obviusly not been paying attention and is therefore your fault. Why should we help you with your homework when it is directly your fault?[/quote]
Why did you spam on my topic. What you posted is niether a poem, nor a useful responce which will be considered as spam.

Have a nice day.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Dell451 wrote:

I really love t.v.
If I didn’t have it,
I’d break my knees,
I watch it in the morning,
My eyeballs are realy hurting,
Mabye that’s a warning,
That I watch too much,
T.v

[quote=“Winter Ice, post:2, topic:82881”]i love t.v
its like im a buzzing bee
i collect my honey
all up on the descovery channel
the aromea of the sweet honey
makes me feel at the top of my peak
i love t.v

:)[/quote]

Lol wtf

Umm I’m not good at poems but I’m sure you could just make a simple poem with a simple rhyme scheme like abab or aabb. Good luck.
